Did actors Russell Crowe or Keanu Reeves say "For me, Trump is the symbol of a successful man and a role model for every young American, something that our nation was looking for for years. I don't think that America will again have a leader like him."? No, that's not true: the fake quote originated on a network of dodgy websites and was initially attributed to Russell Crowe but later was said to have been uttered by Keanu Reeves. According to BuzzSumo the quote was repeated on several dozen websites over the years.

The quote popped up again in an article published by The Daily Trump News on August 13, 2019 titled "Keanu Reeves: "For Me Trump Is The Symbol Of A Successful Man And A Role Model For Every Young American" (archived here) which opened:
